extendedIngredients.name: golden beets
extendedIngredients.original: 4 medium red or golden beets (4 ounces each), stems and root ends removed
extendedIngredients.originalName: medium red or golden beets each), stems and root ends removed

title: Beet Salad
summary: Beet Salad is a gluten free and vegetarian side dish. This recipe makes 4 servings with 185 calories, 6g of protein, and 13g of fat each. For $3.55 per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. Head to the store and pick up walnuts, golden beets, lowfat goat cheese, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 54%. This score is good. Try Roasted Beet and Shallot Salad over Wilted Beet Greens and Arugula, Warm Braised Beet Salad with Beet Greens and Yogurt Dressing (Power Foods), and Beet Salad with Moroccan Spiced Beet Greens for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                                    Heat oven to 400°F. Wrap each beet in foil. Roast until soft, about 1 hour. Cool slightly; remove foil. Rub off skins; cut into wedges. Toss with nuts and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper. Add oil; toss. Divide among 4 plates; crumble cheese on top.                                                                         Nutritional analysis per serving: 167 calories, 11.4 g fat (1.7 g saturated), 13.2 g carbs, 3.8 g fiber, 5.3 g protein                            Nutritional analysis provided by                                        Self

steps.step: Heat oven to 400°F. Wrap each beet in foil. Roast until soft, about 1 hour. Cool slightly; remove foil. Rub off skins; cut into wedges. Toss with nuts and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.
Add oil; toss. Divide among 4 plates; crumble cheese on top.
